title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create an Employee class with:
- Class attributes: company_name, employee_count
- Instance attributes: name, position, salary
- Instance method: give_raise(amount)
- Class method: from_dict(employee_dict)
- Static method: is_valid_salary(amount)
instructions:
Create an Employee class with:
- Class attributes: company_name, employee_count
- Instance attributes: name, position, salary
- Instance method: give_raise(amount)
- Class method: from_dict(employee_dict)
- Static method: is_valid_salary(amount)

hints.text: Use cls.attribute for class attributes in class methods. Static methods don't use cls or self.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
